li.a: Resources to Use With Students During School Closures

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h3:
RESOURCES FOR SUPPORTING YOUR STUDENT
DURING THIS UNPRECEDENTED TIME

p.img: The American School Counselor website provides a wide variety of resources to assist parents in the discussion of COVID-19 with their children. Find this information and a wide variety of additional resources here.

img.alt: Second Step Training Tickets, Multiple Dates | Eventbrite

p.img: We know this is a stressful time for students, families, and educators. Concerns about the spread of COVID-19 are growing.Here, we’ve compiled a list of resources you can use to help young people learn the social-emotional skills they need to get through these challenging events.

img.alt: confident parents confident kids | A site for parents actively ...

div.p: Take a moment to read this article on Supporting your Children’s Social, Emotional, and Mental Health During the COVID-19 Pandemic
